name: DJ Streamer
description: The DJ Streamer plays your audio files out to other programs with a virtual microphone.You can now quickly create a play list from existing files on your computer to broadcast to others. Many popular file formats are supported, such as wave, ogg, windows media and MP3.
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista Processor: Pentium IV 1.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 8.0 DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 5 MB available space Sound Card: 16 bit sound Card, compatible with DirectX 8.0 Additional Notes: Headset microphone and speaker recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 or greater Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 8.0 DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 5 MB available space Sound Card: 16 bit sound Card, compatible with DirectX 8.0 Additional Notes: Headset microphone and speaker recommended
